text: Madalena Lucília Iglésias do Vale de Oliveira (24 October 1939 – 16 January 2018) was a Portuguese actress and singer. She represented Portugal at the Eurovision Song Contest 1966, with the song "Ele e ela". She was born in Lisbon. She also appeared in movies such as Uma hora de Amor (1964), Canção da Saudade (1964) and in Sarilho de fraldas (1966). Iglésias died in Barcelona, Spain on 16 January 2018 at the age of 78. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1939 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Portuguese singers Category:Portuguese movie actors Category:Portuguese television actors Category:Portuguese stage actors Category:Portuguese voice actors Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants Category:Actors from Lisbon
title: Madalena Iglésias
